# cvee

A set of tools for CV researchers.

## Installation

### Install locally

```bash
pip install -e .
```

## Develop

### Format

*maybe add a file watcher in pycharm*

```bash
yapf -ir src/cvee
yapf -ir tests
```

### Lint

```bash
pylint src/cvee
```

### Test

```bash
pytest
```

### Build

```bash

```
